name: Update from Bottom
author: Urban Sanden

sections.description:
1. Save posts/pages from bottom of the screen
  2. Suitable for posts and pages with a lot of meta boxes, or when edit.php just tends to get very long.
  • Github

Feedback

Contact me at hej@urre.me or at https://twitter.com/urre and hopefully I can do something about it.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the update-from-bottom folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the “Update from Bottom” plugin in your WordPress administration interface
  3. Done!
sections.faq:
This plugin is available in the following languages:

  • English
  • Polish
  • Swedish
sections.changelog:
1.0.3

Small change. WordPress version 3.1 no longer a requirement

1.0.2

Bug fix. Buttons showed up on more screens than needed. Now only posts and pages

1.0.1

Bug fix. Hide buttons on main dashboard page

1.0

No longer beta. Added Polish translation files

0.1

  • First public version. It works!

short_description: Shows two extra buttons (Scroll to top and Publish/Update) in the bottom of the screen when user scrolls near bottom.
